description: "You find a strange mushroom in the Greenheart."
functions: Keep it for Luck: Gain 1 XP
(If you have a Bushel) Add It to Your Bushel. Add Heal +20 to your Bushel.
name: A_Strange_Mushroom

description: "The craftsman at the Artisan Dunes offers a variety of ways to enhance your offensive items."
functions: Apprentice Weaponsmith: Give your leftmost Weapon +5 Damage.
Apprentice Flamewright: Your leftmost Burn item gains +1 Burn.
Apprentice Banehand: Your leftmost item gains +1 Poison.
(5) Find Better Craftsman: Double the effects of the offered options.
name: Artisan_Dunes

description: "See all that the Bazaar has to offer"
functions: (12) Artist Alley: Get a Diamond-tier item from the Bazaar.
Swag Collector: Get 3 Small items from the Bazaar.
Self promotion: (if you have a Business Card) Gain 3 XP.
name: BazaarCON

functions: Escape to the sea: (if you have Flagship or Submarine) Gain 6 XP
name: Bounty_Hunters_Event

functions: Treasure Location: Get a random item.
name: Dabora

description: "Some of the Bazaar’s most remarkable technology has been collected here"
functions: Find a friend: Choose a free Friend
Firmware upgrade: Upgrade the Core and gain +10% Max Health.
Improve Friendship: Upgrade your leftmost Friend.
name: Dooley’s_Workshop

functions: Basic Chocolate Bars: Get 5 bronze Chocolate Bars.
(5) Deluxe Chocolate Bars: Get 5 silver Chocolate Bars.
(10) Premium Chocolate Bars: get 5 Gold-tier Chocolate Bars.
name: Eating_Contest

functions: Get an Economic item or skill.
name: Economic_Seminar

description: "Eat at Finn's to get max Health."
functions: Guardian's Gravy Plate: You gain 5% Max Health and your Shield items gain Shield 10.
Restorative Risotto: You gain 5% Max Health and your Heal items gain Heal 10.
Vitality Stew: You gain 5% Max Health and 10 Regeneration.
name: Finn's_Big_Bite

functions: Exploit: Give your leftmost Weapon + 25% Crit Chance.
5 Sharpen Weapon: Your Weapons gain 10 Damage.
10 Upgrade an item: Upgrade your leftmost Weapon.
25 Enchant Shiny: Enchant your leftmost Weapon with Shiny / Obsidian.
name: Form

functions: Wish for Immortality: Gain 5% Max Health.
name: Genie_Lamp_Event

functions: Enchanted Item: Gain a random enchanted item.
Gold Skill: Gain a Gold-tier skill.
Diamond Skill: Gain a Diamond-tier skill.
Mystery Bundle: Get 3 Diamond-tier loot items
name: Haddy

description: "Make a pitch for a financial boost"
functions: Hard Assets: Upgrade your leftmost Property
Appreciated Value: Double the value of your leftmost item
name: Investment_Pitch

functions: Relax: Gain 10% of your Max Health for the rest of the day.
Rejuvenating Blend: Your Heal item gain Heal 50 for the rest of the day.
Strong Brew: Your Weapons gain 25 Damage for the rest of the day.
name: Jule’s_Cafe

description: "You find abandoned ruins in the jungle."
functions: Enjoy the Scenery: Gain 25 Max Health.
(if you are Vanessa) Plunder for Treasure: Gain a Small item.
(if you are Pygmalien) Setup Tourist Attraction: Gain 2 Income
name: Jungle_Ruins

functions: 4. Candy Mail. Adjacent Shield items permanently gain + Shield 1. This permanently loses 1 Max Ammo.
4. Epicurean Chocolate. Adjacent Weapons items permanently gain + 1 Damage. This permanently loses 1 Max Ammo.
4. Super Syrup. Adjacent items permanently gain 1% Crit chance. This permanently loses 1 Max Ammo.
8. Candy Mail. Adjacent Shield items permanently gain + Shield 2. This permanently loses 1 Max Ammo.
8. Epicurean Chocolate. Adjacent Weapons items permanently gain + 2 Damage. This permanently loses 1 Max Ammo.
8. Super Syrup. Adjacent items permanently gain 2% Crit chance. This permanently loses 1 Max Ammo.
name: Likit

description: "Aid the Convoys in navigating the dangerous Mountain Pass"
functions: Guide the Convoy: Gain 2 Gold and 1 XP
Work for the Convoy: Gain 5 Gold

Escort the Convoy: Risky, anything could happen here.
It was uneventful: Gain 1 XP
Treasure Chest: Get an item.
Invest in the Convoy: Pay 1 Gold for 2 Income
name: Mountain_Pass

description: "Take a chance on a rare event or merchant"
name: Mysterious_Portal

functions: 10. Seek Health: Gain 200 to 600 Max Health.
name: Shrouded_Figure

functions: Hero 1: Purchase an item from this Hero
Hero 2: Purchase an item from this Hero
Hero 3: Purchase an item from this Hero
Sell Ice Cream at the Street Festival: (if you have an Ice Cream Truck) Gain 5 Gold and 1 XP.
name: Street_Festival

functions: Steal Dagger: Get a Silver Ritual Dagger.
Blood Price: Lose 10% Max Health and gain 25 Regeneration.
Deadly Covenant: Lose 20% Max Health and enchant your leftmost Weapon with Deadly (Crit Chance).
Vital Sacrifice: Lose 30% Max Health and get a Diamond-tier Runic Double Bow.
name: The_Cult

description: "Work at the Docks to earn some coin"
functions: Work as Security: Gain 2 Gold and a Weapon.
Work as Dockhand: Gain 2 Gold and a Tool.
Work as Maintenance: Gain 2 Gold and a Shield item.
Work as Navigator: (if you have an Astrolabe) Gain 5 Gold and 1 XP.
Work as Navigator: (if you have an Star Chart) Gain 5 Gold and 1 XP.
name: The_Docks

functions: Return the Crate: Gain 2 Gold and 1 XP.
Open the Crate: Get a small or medium item.
name: The_Lost_Crate

functions: Raid the Vault: Grab everything from The Vault
name: Thieves_Guild_Medallion_Event
